2: select email from db_auth.user_info where email=%1% and app_id=%2% and delete_flag=0
3: insert into db_auth.user_info (email, app_id, id, name, password, phone, create_time, last_auth_time) values (%1%, %2%, %3%, %4%, %5%, %6%, now(), now())
4: select id, password from db_auth.user_info where email=%1% and app_id=%2% and delete_flag=0
5: select email, name, phone from db_auth.user_info where id=%1% and delete_flag=0
6: select id from db_auth.user_info where id=%1% and delete_flag=0
7: update db_auth.user_info set delete_flag=1, last_auth_time=now() where id=%1%
